channel.title: [Req] PS2 Softmod
channel.description:
Ok, I want to mod my PS2 so I can play my own burned games, but it would be close to impossible to hardmod it where I'm at lol. So, I read around about PS2 Softmodding, and heard all these things about Swap Magic, etc. Yes, I'm a complete noob when it comes to modding, so go easy on me, mmkay? ;)
Anyways, could someone please explain (if it's possible) how I could softmod my PS2 to play burned games? Thanks.

item.title: [Req] PS2 Softmod
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

…couldnt someone like get his address then send it to him then when he gets done have him send it back to you? then he only gotta pay shipping…

Read full topic

item.title: [Req] PS2 Softmod

item.description:
@ghostboy195 wrote:

would swap magic work with a slim?

Read full topic

item.title: [Req] PS2 Softmod
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

Omfgurweird:

You can burn it, but the reason swap magic works is because it has the encryption of a real PS2 game.

Actually that’s not the reason a burned game wouldn’t work. A valid PS2 CD/DVD has a little ring on the inside with a special code. Normal DVD±R’s don’t have that. Swap Magic works by basically cutting out the ring from ‘Crazy Taxi’ and gluing it onto their CD

Read full topic

item.title: [Req] PS2 Softmod
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

Omfgurweird:

You can burn it, but the reason swap magic works is because it has the encryption of a real PS2 game. If you simply burned it, that would be just like trying to play a burned game on your un-modded PS2. Which you already know… doesn’t work. If you really want to play burned games, then I would suggest paying the 20-30$ for it and have them ship it to you.

thats what i meant by impossible…

wish u could copy the dvd EXACTLY like the laser looks it over then burns same marks on other DVD so it doesnt have to be decrypted

/cry WHY!!! WHY!!!

Read full topic
